DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see whether Family Navigators , 1 ) help family child diagnose autism help get autism specific service child 2 ) help family identify barrier obtain service 3 ) help family problem solve overcome barrier , helpful parent child newly diagnose Autism Spectrum Disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Use Family Navigator Families With Children Newly Diagnosed With Autism Spectrum Disorder
DOC.criteria: Child new confirm diagnosis Autism Spectrum Disorder Child 8 year age Parent mother , father and/or legal guardian child identifies primary caregiver Primary caregiver speak English , Spanish , Haitian Creole , Somali , Vietnamese , Portuguese Chinese Parent legal guardian psychosis Parent legal guardian endorse suicidal ideation Parent legal guardian actively use illicit drug Parent legal guardian expect leave area within 6 month
